title: Private Actress Tokubetsu-hen
original_name: P.A.（プライベートアクトレス） 特別編
sinopse:
Additional stories of Shiho's private acting set during the period after she has become a successful actress.

1. James Dean ni Hanataba wo (Flowers for James Dean)
2. Hepburn wa Kyuujitsuchuu (Hepburn Is on a Holiday)
3. 3-jikan no Doyle (3 o'clock Doyle)

Included one-shot: Katatsumuri no Jikan
